about_the_game:
DLC-exclusive attachment back accessories. Contains a variety of different item designs.

Food Carrier (Black)
Snowboard: Blue (Right)
Snowboard: Blue (Left)
Snowboard: Red (Right)
Snowboard: Red (Left)
Fire Shark

*Open [DLC] under the [Item] page in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After unlocking costumes, apply them via [EQUIP] -> [Costumes] in the main menu.
